cmd.bot_claim.stage1.text:
You are about to claim {{0}}, you need access to the [developer portal of the application](https://discord.com/developers/applications/{{1}}/information).
**Once there click on __Next →__**
cmd.bot_claim.stage2.text:
Once in the developer portal, you need to copy paste the verification key '**{{0}}**' to the description of the application and save.
**Once done click on __Next →__**
cmd.bot_claim.claimed.success: You successfully claimed {{0}}, you can now remove the verification key from the description of the application.

error.feature.not_implemented: This feature is not yet implemented, join [our support server](https://discord.gg/watch) to get notified when this feature will be implemented
error.generic: An error occured, sorry about this.
error.bot.not_in_db: {{0}} This bot was deleted, disabled or the ID is invalid.
error.cmd.bot_bump.next_bump_in: {{0}} You can only bump this bot <t:{{1}}:R>
error.cmd.bot_claim.already_claimed: You can't claim a bot that is already claimed.
error.cmd.bot_claim.failed:
We didn't find the verifcation key in your bot's description. Verify that you copy pasted the verifcation key correctly and then retry.
If you have troubles, you can join [our support server](https://discord.gg/watch) for help.
error.cmd.bot_claim.timeout: Sorry, the command got cancelled because you took more than {{0}} minutes
error.staff.not_allowed: Only allowed staff members can do this action.
